article_title: Terror on all sides: inside a firestorm tearing through the Australian bush
article_description: Guardian Australia reporter Christopher Knaus and photographer Mike Bowers join the Cowie family defending their property about 100km from Canberra

article_body.content: Guardian Australia reporter Christopher Knaus and photographer Mike Bowers join the Cowie family defending their property about 100km from Canberra
Bushfires menace homes and lives – and firefighters warn winds will create new threats • Thomas Keneally: ‘These fires have changed us’
